subject: Order found
description_text:
I shouldn't have had to go searching for my order, but I did, I don't have
money to throw away,  I don't but you'll keeping 90dollars for nothing is
not cool.  So I went to that address and the people were cool, that's a
blessing I don't do people because of my PTSD, plus I needed to get back to
my hobby. I do apologize. AND I thank you'll,  I really enjoyed the last
set and hopefully will enjoy these to. And thanks.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 5184 中
